fxInfo_citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_cross_coder_aggregation: Bayesian Item Response Theory Measurement Model
fxInfo_question: Of the major print and broadcast outlets, how many routinely criticize the government?

fxInfo_responses.value: Some important outlets routinely criticize the government but there are other important outlets that never do.
All major media outlets criticize the government at least occasionally.

fxInfo_scale: Ordinal, converted to interval by the measurement model
name: v2mecrit, *_osp, *_ord
